title: Miniature Portrait of François Maximillien J.I. Robespierre
medium: watercolor on ivory; wood and gilt metal frame
provenance_text: Cardinal Lucien Louis Joseph Napoleon Bonaparte [1803-1857], Rome, Italy; Collection of Cardinal Lucien Louis Joseph Napoleon Bonaparte. Ruel P. Tolman [1879-1954], Washington, DC; purchased by Herbert DuPuy [1856-1930], Pittsburgh, PA, May 13, 1918; gift to Department of Fine Arts, Carnegie Institute, Pittsburgh, PA, November 1927.

creator.birth_place: Paris (Ville de Paris department, Île-de-France, France)
creator.death_place: Paris (Ville de Paris department, Île-de-France, France)
